posts.post_content:
As I near completion on the 1910 T212 175 subjects set, I would like to get a my first 150 subjects card, as of right now it will probably be just as a type card, not sure if I want to tackle the whole set. Looking for any player any condition, graded or raw. If any one could help, I would greatly appreciate it. Please send scan and price info: Thanks in advance...Ralph

[url]rp12367@hotmail.com[/url]

BUMP

I picked one up from Anthony S. It's a little rough around the edges. I wouldn't mind picking up another before I put the 150 series to rest. If anyone has one to spare please lmk... Thanks Ralph

P.S. Thanks Anthony!!!
